text: Welcome, or No Trespassing () is a 1964 Soviet comedy movie directed by Elem Klimov.Умер актер из "Добро пожаловать, или Посторонним вход воспрещен" ШаппуДобро пожаловать, или Посторонним вход воспрещен (1964) It stars Viktor Kosykh, Yevgeniy Yevstigneyev, and Arina Aleynikova. ==Actors== * Viktor Kosykh as Kostya Inochkin * Yevgeniy Yevstigneyev as Comrade Dynin, head of Pioneer Camp * Arina Aleynikova as pioneer leader Valia * Ilya Rutberg as gym teacher * Lidiya Smirnova as doctor == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1964 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Elem Klimov
title: Welcome, or No Trespassing
